JobFullDesc: ProfessionalWe are looking for Principal IAM Engineer in our Enterprise IAM group, who will be heavily involved in the operations, configuration, deployments, and releases of E*TRADE’s Enterprise IAM Platform. This includes Identity Management (IDM), Access Management (IAM), Identity Governance (IGA) and any other tool/products/processes leveraged in that space. The role expects significant ownership system operations to include monitoring, user support for Access Control and Access Recertification teams. Expectations include a deep working knowledge of SailPoint IIQ anticipating risks/issues/blockers and mitigating strategies whilst operating in a fast-paced environment.
